doc.field: This folder was added to the series from a different location. Includes photos of the Luce Tengchow house with individuals sitting and standing outside; part of the college building in Tengchow with observatory and mission house; interior of the Tengchow house; shot of a tennis game at a court in front of the Chefoo School taken from a distance; shot of a large group under a raised flag taken from a distance; the building of the Chefoo School; HRL as a boy with his mother and sisters; and HRL as a boy walking next to his sisters. There is also a letter from Henry Luce III from 1999 with an attached group shot of Mei Hsien Station with HRL as a boy with his parents, sisters, and other missionaries given to the archive by the son of Dr. Robert Dunlap. In addition there are a number of paper copies of photographs as well as negatives for most of the photographs in the folder.
Series IX. Photographs >> 1915 and Before China Scenes
